name: Edinborough Tomato Sauce
description: Edinborough Tomato Sauce 405g is a savory sauce used to enhance the flavor of a wide range of dishes like pasta, Spaghetti, french fries or burgers. The sauce is a popular choice for pasta dishes, stews, casseroles, and grilled meats as well. The bottle features an easy-to-use screw-top lid, which makes it convenient to pour and store. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
